mean_cn: n. 模范，完美之物，优秀之人；  adj. 完美的
mean_en: a person or thing that is perfect or excellent in some way and should be considered a model or example to be copied
word_etyma: para在旁边 + gon角 → 旁边顶尖角色 → paragon 典范
short_phrase: Lei Feng was a paragon of virtue.
sentence: In China, Lei Feng is held up as a paragon of virtue.
sentence_trans: 在中国，雷锋被标榜为美德的典范。
